attributes.action: Create a statue of Nigel Farage and Boris Johnson in honour of EU campaign.
attributes.background: It was thanks to Nigel Farage that we were able to force a EU referendum upon a government that clearly did not want to. It was also thanks to Boris Johnson that we won the campaign and his patriotic speech before the refrerendum. Both men deserve a statue like Churchill.

rejection.details: Whether the Government or Parliament is responsible for statues depends on the location of the statue. We cannot decide whether your petition is Parliament's responsibility without this information.
